name: Xeno-Wonder
description:
Note: You may experience performance issues on weaker machines

Controls
WASD to move
Space to pick up/drop

How to play
Combine tile objects together to create new tile objects

People + People = People
People + Rock = Brick
People + Brick = City
People + Barbarians = Dead Barbarians
Explore more combinations!

How to win
Add Bricks to the pyramid tiles until the build progress reaches 100%

If build progress reaches 0% or there are no more people, the game is over.
